long_description: Designed for a solo traveler or ultralight team of two, the Primus Eta Express(TM) Stove boils water quickly without weighing you down so you can push the pace on the trail. Using a magnetic windscreen and a 1-liter EtaPower(TM) pot with built-in heat exchanger, you'll have a liter of boiling water in just 2.5 min. Compact stove mounts directly onto an isobutane gas canister (not included). Piezo igniter sparks the stove to life with a push of a button, eliminating worries about wet matches or burning your hand. 1-liter pot features heat-resistant silicone foldout handles and an integrated spout for easy pouring. Pot lid is made from BPA-free plastic and features an integrated colander for easy cooking; stove also includes a BPA-free plastic bowl for serving and eating. For the best fuel economy, turn the throttle approximately three-quarters of the way open. Primus Eta Express Stove, including bowl and a 100g gas cartridge (not included) can be packed inside the pot for easy transport.
short_description: Designed for a solo traveler or ultralight team of two, the Primus Eta Express(TM) Stove boils water quickly without weighing you down so you can push the pace on the trail.
